CustomField.description: This needs to look at the related household to determine if this applies to OM
CustomField.formula:
IF(RecordType.DeveloperName = "IndustriesHousehold" && ISPICKVAL( GroupCompany__c , "OM") && Id <> "0018e000003CNci" &&(ISPICKVAL(FinServ__Status__c,"Active") || ISPICKVAL(FinServ__Status__c,"Onboarding") || ISPICKVAL(FinServ__Status__c,"Prospect")), CASESAFEID(Id),
IF(RecordType.DeveloperName = "PersonAccount" && ISPICKVAL( Household_Lookup__r.GroupCompany__c , "OM") && Household_Lookup__c <> "0018e000003CNci" &&(ISPICKVAL(Household_Lookup__r.FinServ__Status__c,"Active") || ISPICKVAL(Household_Lookup__r.FinServ__Status__c,"Onboarding") || ISPICKVAL(Household_Lookup__r.FinServ__Status__c,"Prospect")), CASESAFEID(Household_Lookup__c), ""))
CustomField.label: OM Record
